changeSet.author: lefeuvrem
changeSet.createView: SELECT dealDayByMonth.ENTITY_ID, dealDayByMonth.DEAL_ID, deal.REPORTING_CURRENCY_CODE, deal.VOLUME_UOM_CODE, dealDayByMonth.DEAL_MTH_DATE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_TYPE_CODE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_SUBTYPE_CODE, dealDayByMonth.EXPIRED_FLG, dealDayByMonth.DAY_1_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_2_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_3_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_4_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_5_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_6_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_7_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_8_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_9_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_10_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_11_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_12_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_13_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_14_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_15_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_16_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_17_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_18_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_19_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_20_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_21_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_22_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_23_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_24_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_25_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_26_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_27_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_28_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_29_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_30_VALUE, dealDayByMonth.DAY_31_VALUE FROM DEAL_DAY_BY_MTH dealDayByMonth INNER JOIN BASE_DEAL deal ON deal.ENTITY_ID = dealDayByMonth.DEAL_ID
